application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been provided in respect of noise impact and mitigation measures. The submitted details therefore fail to satisfy the requirements of Condition 2 of planning application P/0802/20/PRIOR, in the absence of which the proposal fails to ensure that adequate precautions are taken to avoid noise nuisance for the future occupiers of this site and to safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents. The proposals have therefore failed to demonstrate compliance with Condition 2, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), Policy D14 of The London Plan (2021), policy CS1 of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Details pursuant to Conditions 1 (Cycle Parking) and 2 (Noise Transmission) attached to Prior Approval P/0802/20/PRIOR dated 17/04/2020 for Change Of Use of rear part of ground floor from Retail (Class A1) to one self-contained flat (Class C3);  External alterations (Prior Approval of Noise Impacts of the Development, Impacts of the Hours of Opening of the Development, Transport and Highways Impacts of the Development and the Desirability of the Change of Use).
